title: Residual Finiteness of $A_{2,3,2n}$ Triangle Artin Groups
abstract:
We prove that triangle Artin groups of the type $A_{2,3,2n}$ are residually
finite for all $n\geq4$. This requires splitting these triangle Artin groups as
graphs of groups and then proving that each of these graphs of groups has
finite stature with respect to its vertex groups.
